coreAtributes.name: leather belt
coreAtributes.description: A simple leather belt that gets better with age.

displacementText.playerSelf: You unbuckle the belt from your hips.
displacementText.playerNPC: You unbuckle the belt from [npc.Name]'s hips.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You jerk the belt off of [npc.Name]'s waist and rip it free.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] unbuckles the belt from your hips.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] jerks the belt off your waist and rips it free.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slip the belt around your waist and buckle it.
replacementText.playerNPC: You wrap the belt around [npc.Name]'s waist and buckle it.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You snatch [npc.name]'s hips and wrap the belt around their waist.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] wraps the belt around their waist and buckles it.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] wraps the belt around your waist and buckles it.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] snatches your hips and wraps the belt around you tightly.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] wraps the belt around [npc2.Name]'s waist and buckles it.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs [npc2.name]'s hips and wraps the belt around their waist.
